content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I understand you might need help with plumbing. Can I have your name, please?
Thanks, Emily! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we're servicing your area?
Great! You are within our service area. Could you please describe the plumbing issue you're experiencing?
My kitchen sink is leaking and the faucet drips constantly.
Thanks for the info. When would be an ideal time for our plumber to come by and fix the leak?
Honestly, I’m not sure yet. I think I’ll try to fix it myself first before scheduling a visit.
I understand, Emily. If the issue persists or you need professional help, please don’t hesitate to contact us. Would you like me to keep your contact info on file for a future booking?
No, thanks. I’ll reach out if I need you. Bye!
reason: Customer decided to try fixing issue herself
